title: IMathVector.IMultiplyTransform
description: Multiplies this math vector by the specified math transform.

parameters.name: TransformObjIn
parameters.description: Math transform by which to multiply the math vector

returns: Newly created math vector or NULL if the operation fails
remarks: The matrix is rotated and then scaled. It is not transformed because the math vector is assumed to be positionless.
